channel.title: Announcement on 99's? [Delta]
channel.description: Does anyone know how i can make it so when a player gets 99 in a skill it yells something like "player has just gotten level 99 in attack!"? i'm not asking for someone to tell me every step but i'd like some help on finding out where to start because nothing i can think of works :o

item.title: Announcement on 99's? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Carnifex12 Carnifex12
item.description:
@Carnifex12 wrote:

Thanks so much this worked perfect!

Read full topic

item.title: Announcement on 99's? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

very simple open up client.java, search for // stillgfx(623, absY, absX);

You’ll see something like this

		[code]playerLevel[skill] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[skill]);
		// stillgfx(623, absY, absX);
		// levelup(skill);
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
		sM("Congratulations, you just advanced a "
				+ statName[skill] + " level.");
		getTotalLevel();[/code]

Under getTotalLevel();

Add:

if (playerLevel[skill] == 99) yell(""+playerName+" has achieved level 99 in "+statName[skill]+".");

Read full topic
